buy_and_store_paragraph: Simply, Securely & without the wait, Xcoins is your gateway to cryptocurrency. Start buying and keeping cryptocurrencies in  your Xcoins wallet today.
coin_img_heading: LOVED BY OUR CUSTOMERS. TRUSTED BY THE COMMUNITY.
support_heading_one: The customer support level is the best I've ever seen, and they're constantly adding new features and improving the ones.
why_xcoins_paragraph_one: We’ll send your Bitcoin within 15 minutes of payment approval or your next transaction is Fee FREE!
why_xcoins_paragraph_two: We offer a safe, secure and easy-to-use platform that features instant crypto delivery to your wallet
why_xcoins_paragraph_three: We specialize in live support 24/7 via instant chat, email and phone so you are never alone
join_paragraph_one: Refer a friend and everyone get rewarded
join_paragraph_two: You get: $10 and 10% of the fees for life
start_buying_paragraph: We put the power in your hands to buy, sell and trade digital currency.
buy_crypto_paragraph: Xcoins provides you with quick and easy access to cryptocurrency, allowing you to buy Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin with your Visa or Mastercard debit and credit card.
create_wallet_paragraph: Xcoins offers a secure and simple way to store your cryptocurrency in an online digital wallet. You can create your Xcoins crypto wallet today.
exchange_currency_paragraph: Exchange your fiat for Bitcoin, or turn your Bitcoin into cash, using your Visa or Mastercard, credit or debit card.
how_xcoins_paragraph_one: Just sign up, upload your ID doc and open your account today - it’s super quick.
how_xcoins_paragraph_two: Select which tokens you would like to buy - we currently sell BTC, ETH and LTC.
how_xcoins_paragraph_three: We will send tokens to your wallet within 15 minutes of payment approval.
